scenario_text.value: Dammit... This guy ain’t no joke!

I know this goes without sayin’, Kaito, but
keep fighting with no plan and we’re boned.

Obviously! But it ain’t like we can just jump
out of the way, here!

This isn’t going to work. Forget about me,
you need to escape!

Don’t say crap like that, it just makes this
harder on us! Keep your mouth shut!
Watch your tongue...

But that squirt’s important to you, ain’t
he?!
...Wait, what?

Hold up, is Kaito holding his ground for
Miu’s sake?

I told you, dammit. I don’t wanna see her
upset again.

You have no clue how heartsick she’d be if
this guy got taken out!
Ka... Kaito...

Dammit, if I just had more power... Power to
protect Miu from sadness!

Strength to protect Miu, protect what she
cares about. Strength to crush our enemies!

Kaito...! My man, if it’s power ya want...
then believe in me!
Dracmon?!

I’m what you’ve been looking for. Power to
get rid of any nonsense ya want gone!

If you wanna guard what’s important from all
this craziness, then wish, dammit! WISH HARD!

Dracmon... I hear ya, loud and clear. You can
be my strength, here and now.

Get stronger! Strong enough to protect Miu
from any pain!

If you say we’re bound by fate, then grant my
wish, dammit!
Urgh... Ack! Kaito...!
Dracmon?!

Kaito...that strong wish of yours...gives
me...strength!!!

Feast yer eyes on me... On my ultimate
power!!!
Dracmon...evolved?!

Heheheheh. Sorry to keep you waiting. Now
it’s my turn!
